dynamic-hibernate.query: SELECT serviceGroup_Id, service_Name, group_Name FROM CC_SERVICE_GROUP WHERE 1=1 #if($service_Name) AND service_Name LIKE :service_Name #end #if($group_Name) AND group_Name LIKE :group_Name #end ORDER BY serviceGroup_Id DESC

SELECT serviceGroup_Id, service_Name, group_Name FROM CC_SERVICE_GROUP WHERE 1=1 #if($service_Name) AND service_Name = :service_Name #end #if($group_Name) AND group_Name = :group_Name #end ORDER BY serviceGroup_Id DESC

SELECT sg.serviceGroup_Id, sg.service_Name, g.group_Id, g.group_Name, g.manual_Status FROM CC_GROUP g INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM CC_SERVICE_GROUP WHERE service_Name = :service_Name) sg ON g.group_Name = sg.group_Name WHERE 1=1 #if($group_Id) AND g.group_Id = :group_Id #end #if($group_Name) AND g.group_Name LIKE :group_Name #end #if($manual_Status) AND g.manual_Status = :manual_Status #end ORDER BY g.group_Id

SELECT g.group_Id, g.group_Name, g.manual_Status FROM CC_GROUP g WHERE 1=1 #if($group_Id) AND g.group_Id = :group_Id #end #if($group_Name) AND g.group_Name LIKE :group_Name #end #if($manual_Status) AND g.manual_Status = :manual_Status #end AND g.group_Name NOT IN (SELECT group_Name FROM CC_SERVICE_GROUP WHERE service_Name = :service_Name) ORDER BY g.group_Id
